repairedDockerfile:
FROM python:3.6

ENV PYTHONUNBUFFERED 0

RUN apt-get update \
    && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y gdal-bin python-gdal python3-gdal && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

COPY requirements.txt /usr/src/

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir --upgrade pip \
    && pip install --no-cache-dir pip-tools \
    && pip install --no-cache-dir --src /usr/src -r /usr/src/requirements.txt

RUN mkdir /code

WORKDIR /code

COPY . /code
